markdownRemark.html:
Throttle VS Debounce

Link

Throttle: the original function be called at most once per specified period. Debounce: the original function be called after the caller stops calling the decorated function after a specified period.

Throttle: 몇 초에 한번 함수 호출 Debounce: 몇초당 한번 콜러가 콜을 그만뒀는지 보고 그만뒀으면 함수 호출

References

https://stackoverflow.com/questions/25991367/difference-between-throttling-and-debouncing-a-function
